3:
--------------------
Text: Wonder en is gheen Wonder:  The title is a reference to the 16th century Flemish mathematician and engineer Simon Stevin's commentary to his famous thought experiment: even if something looks strange, it can still have a naturalistic explanation.
Triplets:<Simon Stevin
